products.title: Infusion Asc Azure Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc azure perfect fit pleated blind part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Infusion Solar Pale Blue Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. A strong blue tone, pale blue bring feelings of the ocean to your home. Pair with soft breezy scents and light furnishings to create a relaxation room. Product id: db-nfpl0008 fabric colour: pale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
